Useful sites, if you have suggestions please [get in touch](mailto:reproducibilitea@sheffield.ac.uk), you may also wish
to join the [Reproducibilitea Sheffield Mailing List](https://groups.google.com/a/sheffield.ac.uk/g/reproducibilitea).

## Suggested Articles

There is a dedicated Zotero library for Reproducibilitea Journal Clubs. You can add articles that fit the remit or
search for articles to discuss. Find out more [here](https://reproducibilitea.org/zotero-group) and browse articles [here](https://www.zotero.org/groups/2354006/reproducibilitea?).
